targets.query: SELECT integral("power") /3600000 FROM "raw_cts" WHERE ("ct" = '0') AND $timeFilter
SELECT integral("power") /3600000 FROM "raw_cts" WHERE ("ct" = '5') AND $timeFilter
SELECT integral("power") /3600000 FROM "raw_cts" WHERE ("ct" = '1') AND $timeFilter
SELECT integral("power") /3600000 FROM "raw_cts" WHERE ("ct" = '2') AND $timeFilter
SELECT integral("power") /3600000 FROM "raw_cts" WHERE ("ct" = '3') AND $timeFilter
SELECT integral("power") /3600000 FROM "raw_cts" WHERE ("ct" = '4') AND $timeFilter
SELECT integral("power") /3600 FROM "raw_cts" WHERE ("ct" = '5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT integral("power") /3600 FROM "raw_cts" WHERE ("ct" = '0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT integral("power") /3600 FROM "raw_cts" WHERE ("ct" = '1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT integral("power") /3600 FROM "raw_cts" WHERE ("ct" = '2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT integral("power") /3600 FROM "raw_cts" WHERE ("ct" = '3') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT integral("power") /3600 FROM "raw_cts" WHERE ("ct" = '4') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)
